review: For the first 14 weeks that I had the Roku Streaming Stick, it was fantastic. Then, come week 15, it stopped working. In an 8 hour span, the stick stopped being able to receive a signal. I've done all of the suggested steps to fix, but nothing works. Looked at the warranty, the maximum is 90 days. I posted on the Roku forum, and someone else said he had the same problem as I did - after much haggling, he finally got someone to send him a new one. I'm not one to haggle, but I will warn the rest of you to be wary of this device and I've learned my lesson with purchasing a Roku product.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I have spent hours online with tech support trying to get it to work right. It gets real annoying when you can't see an entire picture on any source from beginning to end, and it took some more time with tech support to even get to the viewing stage. With all the time wasted getting it to work it would probably be more cost effective to buy a new smart tv.
